description: All locales and translations that are available in BYTM

^[a-z]{2}-[A-Z]{2}$.description: Locale code in the format ll-CC (language-country)

name.description: Name and country of the language, e.g. "Deutsch (Deutschland)"

nameEnglish.description: English name and country of the language, e.g. "German (Germany)"

authors.description: List of authors that contributed to the translation

altLocales.description: Alternative locale codes that will be redirected to this locale, e.g. for all German languages: ["de", "de-AT", "de-CH", "de-LI", "de-LU"]
